title: Tortured Soul
description: Emily Donovan didn't know love, she didn't know gentle and her future wasn't hers to own. Because HE owned her. There is only so much one soul can take before it is broken beyond repair and she reached that milestone long ago.Braiden Montgomery has secrets, secrets that would see a special place in hell reserved just for him. His heart is a black sheet of ice, but when a waif of a girl with jet black hair and pale blue eyes enters his world, that ice starts to thaw.Em had been stolen from her world of safety, and it was Braiden who stole her back. Now they just had to survive the fallout. Read Order:Saving EllaFighting BackTortured SoulMother's LoveLosing Lola
author: Kirsty Dallas
